name: Control Something
author: ixM-
notes: My updated Oct. KOG control deck. This deck was able to beat pre nerf 3sd ninjas, ca, weevil burn, Rez and hazy flame. Black brachios effect mix with electro lock down with sasuke effect, you able to get over big monsters. I had Rex field spell, but I would lose because I needed that 1 Card. I updated to destiny draw and the deck did not lose from legend 2-KOG
